locales.description: !! NOT YET IMPLEMENTED !! Posts containing an image, no alt-text, and no post text. This is a safety-check to avoid unwanted content that has no means of being labeled/filtered. (Automated labeling).  Temporarily suspended due to the excessive amount of matching posts.
locales.name: Image-only post with no alt-txt

locales.description: Post contains links to x.com, aka Twitter. (Automated labeling)
locales.name: Twitter Link

locales.description:
Post contains common tags associated with pornography OR emoji typically used in lieu of tags AND there is media attached. 

An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled. 

(Automated labeling)
locales.name: Porn posts

locales.description: Posts contain terms typical of trolling behavior, such as 'sleepy joe' or 'libtard'. An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled. (Automated labeling)
locales.name: Trollish posts

locales.description:
Posts containing racial, religious, or other slurs.

An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled.
locales.name: Slurs

locales.description: Posts containing common curse words. An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled. (Automated labeling)
locales.name: Cursing

locales.description: Posts containing terms typically used as derogatory slurs against the LGBTQIA+ community or "cursing" that is anti-LGBTQIO+. An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled. (Automated labeling)
locales.name: Homophobic Slurs
